    "number": 158784,
    "data": "1,4,16,72,288,1168,5184,20768,85120,373312,1499392,6194304,26890752,108349696,450216960,1937707520,7834814464,32689300480,139682910208,566806726656,2371481051136,10073319706624,41018592608256",
    "name": "Expansion of (1+4*x+14*x^2)/(1-2*x^2-64*x^3).",
    "comment": [
        "Can be generated by multiplying the sum of the top row of the n-th power of the matrix [ (0,2,0), (0,0,2), (2,1/4,0)] by 2^n."
    ],
    "link": [
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (0,2,64)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n)= 2*a(n-2) +64*a(n-3). [From R. J. Mathar, Mar 31 2009]"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Clear[M, v, t, n];",
        "M = {{0, t, 0}, {0, 0, t}, {t, 1/t^2, 0}};",
        "v[0] = {1, 1, 1};",
        "v[n_] := v[n] = M.v[n - 1];",
        "CharacteristicPolynomial[M, x];",
        "t = 2;",
        "a = Table[t^n*v[n][[1]], {n, 0, 30}]"
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,2",
    "author": "_Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 26 2009",
    "references": 0,
    "revision": 8,
    "time": "2015-06-13T00:53:11-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
